import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-about-us', templateUrl: './about-us.component.html', styleUrls: ['./about-us.component.scss'] }) export class AboutUsComponent { }

About Us

Our vision

A world where our community
thrives.

Our mission

To support disabled and sick people
by providing prosthetic and medicine.

Our values

Commitment to serve.
We are consciously committed.
